text:
[Verse]
In the morning light rise
Wipe the sleep from my eyes
Chasing dreams on the fly
Never say goodbye

[Verse 2]
Steps on the open road
Carrying a heavy load
The world feels so wide
I got you by my side

[Chorus]
Dreams will carry us through
To the skies so blue
We'll reach new heights
With you all nights

[Verse 3]
Stars glisten up above
Feel the warmth of love
We’re stronger every day
Together we will stay

[Verse 4]
Every hurdle we clear
Future doesn’t feel fear
With our hearts as guide
We walk side by side

[Chorus]
Dreams will carry us through
To the skies so blue
We'll reach new heights
With you all nights
title: Chaser of Dreams
